title: Software Developer
description:
• Developed Pabbly ChatFlow (chatflow.pabbly.com), a WhatsApp automation platform, integrating WhatsApp Cloud APIs for real-time messaging and automated communication.
• Built scalable applications using MERN stack, Docker, AWS EC2, and Cloudflare R2, implementing webhooks for real-time communication.
• Created and maintained comprehensive API documentation to enable efficient integration with third-party applications and services.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features on time, and align with business objectives.
company: Magnet Brains Software Technology Pvt. Ltd.

title: Trainee + Intern
description:
• Gained hands-on experience with the MERN stack, enhancing front-end and back-end skills.
• Contributed to the development of an ERP system during the internship.
• Gained practical knowledge of full project lifecycle execution.
• Improved development skills through practical training and real-world application.
• Collaborated closely with teams to meet project deadlines and improve code quality.
